translation.ja: マザー！母(かあ)さんたちのコアをお願(ねが)い

translation.en: -Here. -Initiating reintegration stasis.
translation.ja: マザー！母(かあ)さんたちのコアをお願(ねが)い ステイシス開始(かいし)

translation.en: Rewriting the King and Queen's molecular code.
translation.ja: 分子(ぶんし)コード書(か)き直(なお)し

translation.en: Fix them, mother ship. Please fix them!
translation.ja: お願(ねが)い 母(かあ)さんたちを治(なお)して

translation.en: Time to completion, unknown.
translation.ja: 完了(かんりょう)までの時間(じかん) 不明(ふめい)

translation.en: [Coranda] Aja?
translation.ja: アジャ？

translation.en: -Aja! -[gasps]
translation.ja: アジャ

translation.en: Royals don't need to skulk under the cover of darkness.
translation.ja: 王族(おうぞく)がコソコソするなんて

translation.en: They do when they don't want to be caught staying up past curfew.
translation.ja: 門限(もんげん)を過(す)ぎて帰宅(きたく)してるから

translation.en: I can't be what you want me to be. I can't be a royal.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)は 理想(りそう)の王族(おうぞく)の子(こ)にはなれない

translation.en: No one gets to choose their station in life, Aja.
translation.ja: 身分(みぶん)は選(えら)べない従(したが)うしかないの

translation.en: Maybe I'll be the first.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)が それを変(か)える

translation.en: There are those who would trade their life cores for royalty.
translation.ja: 王族(おうぞく)になりたい人(ひと)もいる

translation.en: And I would trade my royalty for a life.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)は 普通(ふつう)の人(ひと)になりたい

translation.en: -A normal life. -You're remarkable, Aja.
translation.ja: 王族(おうぞく)じゃなく アジャは特別(とくべつ)な子(こ)よ

translation.en: [sighs] You say that because you're my mother.
translation.ja: 親(おや)だから そう言(い)うの

translation.en: Royal or not, you are extraordinary, Aja.
translation.ja: 王族(おうぞく)かどうかなんて関係(かんけい)ない

translation.en: That is what you are constantly running away from.
translation.ja: 自分自身(じぶんじしん)から逃(に)げてはダメよ

translation.en: You could leave this palace, fly far away from our world...
translation.ja: この宮殿(きゅうでん)から離(はな)れ遠(とお)くへ行(い)ったとしても

translation.en: and your destiny would follow you.
translation.ja: 運命(うんめい)は変(か)わらない

translation.en: Aja, it's going to be all right.
translation.ja: アジャきっと大丈夫(だいじょうぶ)だよ

translation.en: I'm not entirely sure how, but...
translation.ja: どうするかは分(わ)からないけど…

translation.en: They're gone.
translation.ja: いないんだよ

translation.en: Our parents. [sobs]
translation.ja: 母(かあ)さんも父(とう)さんも

translation.en: And it's all my fault.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)のせい

translation.en: -Don't be ridiculous. -I ran away.
translation.ja: バカ言(い)うなよ 逃(に)げたから

translation.en: If I had been on time at the ceremony,
translation.ja: もし私(わたし)が 時間(じかん)どおり式(しき)に行(い)ってたら

translation.en: it would have started sooner, which means it would have ended sooner,
translation.ja: 式(しき)は 早(はや)く終(お)わってた そしたら 母(かあ)さんも父(とう)さんも

translation.en: which means Mama and Papa would have been safe in the palace.
translation.ja: 宮殿(きゅうでん)にいて 安全(あんぜん)だった

translation.en: Hey!
translation.ja: アジャ

translation.en: And it would have ended sooner if I had done better in the duel.
translation.ja: 俺(おれ)だって武術(ぶじゅつ)の披露(ひろう)で時間(じかん)をくった

translation.en: If anything, we're both to blame.
translation.ja: アジャだけのせいじゃない
私(わたし)…

translation.en: I miss them already.
translation.ja: もう寂(さび)しいよ

translation.en: So do I.
translation.ja: 俺(おれ)も

translation.en: You look as if you need a hug.
translation.ja: ハグが必要(ひつよう)なら―

translation.en: I'll get Varvatos.
translation.ja: 呼(よ)んでくるよ

translation.en: Varvatos? [chuckles]
translation.ja: ヴァルヴァトスを？

translation.en: Varvatos, little brother, he never hugs.
translation.ja: ハグしたことなさそう

translation.en: That's true.
translation.ja: 言(い)えてる

translation.en: [imitates Vex] I am Varvatos. Varvatos destroys!
translation.ja: 俺(おれ)はヴァルヴァトスだヴァルヴァトス破壊(はかい)する

translation.en: [Mother] The V-Strykers are not equipped for space travel. We are clear.
translation.ja: Ｖストライカーはもう追(お)ってこれません

translation.en: Mother, that won't last long.
translation.ja: 油断(ゆだん)はできない

translation.en: We need to head somewhere they won't think to look for us.
translation.ja: どこか見(み)つからないところへ

translation.en: The worse the planet, the better for us.
translation.ja: ヒドい惑星(わくせい)のほうが都合(つごう)がいい

translation.en: I can only locate two planets which fit your description.
translation.ja: あてはまる惑星(わくせい)は２つです

translation.en: One is about to be devoured by a black hole.
translation.ja: １つ目(め)はブラックホール付近(ふきん)

translation.en: Mm. Maybe not that one.
translation.ja: ダメだな

translation.en: The other is a floating ball of mud and water.
translation.ja: ２つ目(め)は泥(どろ)と水(みず)で できた球体(きゅうたい)

translation.en: Its inhabitants named it after dirt.
translation.ja: 大地(だいち)から名(な)をとった―

translation.en: -They call it "Earth." -"Earth!"
translation.ja: “地球(ちきゅう)”という惑星(わくせい) へえ

translation.en: It sounds beautiful.
translation.ja: 地球(ちきゅう)って いい名前(なまえ)ね

translation.en: This is going to be quite the adventure.
translation.ja: 大冒険(だいぼうけん)になりそう

translation.en: I wonder what we will find there!
translation.ja: どんな場所(ばしょ)かな

translation.en: Ouch!
translation.ja: 痛(いた)っ…

translation.en: [laughs] We didn't explode!
translation.ja: 爆発(ばくはつ)しなかった

translation.en: [chuckles] Of course not. Varvatos was at the helm.
translation.ja: ヴァルヴァトスが操縦(そうじゅう)したからな

translation.en: And yet, we're still alive.
translation.ja: まだ生(い)きててよかった

translation.en: -We did it! -[Mother] Systems damaged.
translation.ja: やった システム損傷(そんしょう)

translation.en: [Vex] Engage protective force shield.
translation.ja: 防御(ぼうぎょ)シールドをオン

translation.en: Force shield inoperable.
translation.ja: できません

translation.en: Reroute all power to the camouflage matrix.
translation.ja: マザーシップをカモフラージュ

translation.en: Complying.
translation.ja: 分(わ)かりました

translation.en: I have chosen a model based on the planet's primitive transmissions.
translation.ja: 惑星(わくせい)の原始的(げんしてき)な通信(つうしん)を使(つか)うため―

translation.en: They broadcast at sub-light speed, so they're bound to be rather old.
translation.ja: 再現(さいげん)できるモデルは古(ふる)めになります

translation.en: Wow. They really put this one up fast.
translation.ja: 高速(こうそく)で家(いえ)が建(た)った

translation.en: [Mother] One of the indigenous life forms is approaching. It may be hostile.
translation.ja: 惑星(わくせい)の生命体(せいめいたい)がこちらに接近(せっきん) 敵(てき)の可能性(かのうせい)も

translation.en: He wears massive shields over his eyes.
translation.ja: 目(め)にシールドをつけてる

translation.en: He must be a dreaded warrior.
translation.ja: 恐(おそ)ろしい戦士(せんし)に違(ちが)いない

translation.en: Varvatos will slay him!
translation.ja: ヴァルヴァトス殺(ころ)す

translation.en: You cannot kill everyone. We are in hiding.
translation.ja: むやみに殺(ころ)せない私(わたし)たちは隠(かく)れてるの

translation.en: But for Varvatos, death is a way of life.
translation.ja: ヴァルヴァトスには死(し)は生(い)きがい

translation.en: -[doorbell rings] -[boy] Hello?
translation.ja: すみません

translation.en: -What is that awful noise? -Make it stop!
translation.ja: ヒドい音(おと)だ 止(と)めて

translation.en: Anyone home?
translation.ja: 誰(だれ)か？

translation.en: Can I interest you in a subscription to the Arcadia Oaks Ledger?
translation.ja: この新聞(しんぶん)を― 購読(こうどく)しませんか

translation.en: [Vex] The cylindrical object in his hand...
translation.ja: 手(て)に何(なに)か持(も)ってる

translation.en: -[boy] Hello? -...is it a weapon? [chuckles]
translation.ja: もしや武器(ぶき)か

translation.en: [Mother] The life form seems quite persistent.
translation.ja: この生命体(せいめいたい)はしつこいようです

translation.en: -We cannot let it see us. -What does that mean?
translation.ja: 姿(すがた)は見(み)せられん ずっと外(そと)に出(で)られないの？

translation.en: We are trapped in here forever?
translation.ja: ずっと外(そと)に出(で)られないの？

translation.en: -Of course not! -[boy] Hello?
translation.ja: それは違(ちが)う

translation.en: Eventually, we'll be found by Morando's forces and massacred ever so slowly.
translation.ja: いずれはモランドに見(み)つかりゆっくり殺(ころ)される

translation.en: He's right. We have to at least buy time for the ship to repair Mama and Papa.
translation.ja: マザーシップが母(かあ)さんたちを治(なお)す時間(じかん)を稼(かせ)がないと

translation.en: Mother ship, what is the state of the transduction chambers?
translation.ja: トランスダクションは？

translation.en: [Mother] Nominal. What is your question?
translation.ja: それが どうしました？

translation.en: You can reconfigure our energies into a form
translation.ja: 俺(おれ)たちの姿(すがた)を この惑星(わくせい)の生命体(せいめいたい)に似(に)せてよ

translation.en: -that resembles this planet's life forms. -They call themselves "humans."
translation.ja: 俺(おれ)たちの姿(すがた)を この惑星(わくせい)の生命体(せいめいたい)に似(に)せてよ “人間(にんげん)”と言(い)います

translation.en: Mother, you have to design forms for us that no one will ever pay attention to.
translation.ja: マザー ここに馴染(なじ)めるよう我(われ)らの姿(すがた)を変(か)えてくれ

translation.en: You need to make us invisible!
translation.ja: 日陰(ひかげ)の存在(そんざい)にしてほしい

translation.en: I have chosen three forms that people on the mud planet tend to ignore.
translation.ja: 地球(ちきゅう)で注目(ちゅうもく)されない３つの形態(けいたい)を選択(せんたく)

translation.en: The first of such invisible forms is a girl.
translation.ja: 最初(さいしょ)の形態(けいたい)は 女(おんな)の子(こ)です

translation.en: Girls here are invisible?
translation.ja: 注目(ちゅうもく)されないの？

translation.en: The next is called a Latino.
translation.ja: 次(つぎ)に“ラティーノ”

translation.en: I don't understand. What is "La-tino"?
translation.ja: ラティノって何(なに)？

translation.en: That sounds fantastic. It sounds rather regal.
translation.ja: いいわね王族(おうぞく)っぽい響(ひび)きだし

translation.en: You, Commander Vex, will be reconfigured as... a senior citizen.
translation.ja: そして ベックスは町(まち)のシニア市民(しみん)です

translation.en: Glorious! Varvatos should be senior to all.
translation.ja: 輝(かがや)かしい！ヴァルヴァトスは重鎮(じゅうちん)であれ

translation.en: All three forms sound like winners!
translation.ja: どの形態(けいたい)も勝者(しょうしゃ)には間違(まちが)いない

translation.en: All right, maybe you're not home.
translation.ja: 分(わ)かりました　留守(るす)ですね

translation.en: I'll just leave a complimentary copy here.
translation.ja: お試(ため)しの１部(ぶ)を置(お)いていきます

translation.en: -Prepare to be destroyed, who-man! -[screams]
translation.ja: 覚悟(かくご)しろ  にゅん間(げん)！

translation.en: [Aja] So, you see, things did not go exactly according to plan for us.
translation.ja: というわけで 物事(ものごと)は思(おも)いどおりには運(はこ)ばなかった

translation.en: But they weren't going according to plan for General Morando, either.
translation.ja: でも それはモランド将軍(しょうぐん)も同(おな)じでした

translation.en: Say that again.
translation.ja: もう一度(いちど) 言(い)ってみろ

translation.en: We couldn't track the mother ship.
translation.ja: 見失(みうしな)いました

translation.en: It must've been some kind of cloaking device.
translation.ja: クローキング装置(そうち)かと

translation.en: That's what I thought you said.
translation.ja: そう聞(き)こえたさ

translation.en: There's no place in the galaxy the royals can hide that is beyond my reach.
translation.ja: この銀河(ぎんが)に 俺(おれ)の目(め)が届(とど)かない場所(ばしょ)などない

translation.en: Assemble the bounty hunters. No one can survive them.
translation.ja: 賞金稼(しょうきんかせ)ぎを集(あつ)めろ誰(だれ)もヤツらからは逃(に)げられん
